subject: feat(query): make query builder collapsible on mobile
body:
On mobile (<768px), the query builder consumed too much vertical space,
pushing the graph off-screen. Now it starts collapsed with a compact
summary bar showing filter count and result summary. Tapping expands
the full builder; running a search auto-collapses back to the summary.
Desktop layout is unchanged â€” collapsed bar is hidden via CSS.
